an3.8:1.1: “A fool is known by three things.
an3.8:1.3: Hurtful deeds by way of body, speech, and mind. … An astute person is known by kind deeds by way of body, speech, and mind.
an3.8:1.4: These are the three things by which an astute person is known.
an3.8:2.1: So you should train like this:
an3.8:2.2: ‘We will shun the three qualities by which a fool is known, and we will undertake and follow the three qualities by which an astute person is known.’
